attrib:
EXTRA DAMAGE FOR HEROES: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25
EXTRA DAMAGE: 5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5
RADIUS: 375 / 375 / 375 / 375
DURATION: 8 / 8 / 8 / 8
MOVEMENT SLOW: 3% / 5% / 7% / 9%
TURN RATE SLOW: 70% / 70% / 70% / 70%
cmb:
MANA COST: 20/20/20/20
COOLDOWN: 3
desc: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.
notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.
lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
name: batrider_sticky_napalm

cmb:
MANA COST: 140
COOLDOWN: 14
desc: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back and dealing damage to enemies in the area.
lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
name: batrider_flamebreak

attrib:
DAMAGE OVER TIME: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80
RADIUS: 200 / 200 / 200 / 200
DURATION: 18 / 18 / 18 / 18
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 40
desc: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a flaming trail from the air.  While flying, the trail of fire destroys trees and damages enemies in its path, and Batrider gains the movement capabilities of a flying unit.
notes:
During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.
If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.
The fire destroys trees.
The trail persists through Batrider's death.
lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
name: batrider_firefly

cmb:
MANA COST: 225
COOLDOWN: 90/75/60
desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
notes:
Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.
If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.
Disable works on magic immune units.
Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.
lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
name: batrider_flaming_lasso
